attributes.action: Help to Reinstate Alison Waldock (Dinner lady of 11 years).
attributes.additional_details: .. she was sacked for serving up gammon (pork) to a muslim child who had asked for it! There was such an overaction to a simple error that she deserves some justice and intervention by the powers that can have an influence on her current employment status with Lunchtime UK. This shoud not have occured and any help for this low level worker would no doubt be very appreciated.
